## StringEncodedMetricFormats variable

Array of all supported \[\[StringEncodedNumeralFormat\]\]s describing sizes, lengths and distances.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
StringEncodedMetricFormats: StringEncodedNumeralFormat[]
```
